pullrequest.title: Stop the world from a plugin

content.raw: Looking at the code I can not say if the changes in the destroy/disable/delete sequences are safe but playing with the simulator I was not able to make it to fail and all the shutdowns were fine for me even playing with gazebo\_ros\_pkgs on top of this PR. Let's wait for the results of the CI but I did not found big problems. Thanks Olivier!
